text:
Hello all! I try to create app to integrate our service with HubSpot.

I want our clients (who have HS accounts) to be able to view/edit their contacts, deals, companies, and other information in HubSpot. There is desirable for the client to be able to authorisation through oAuth2.

Do I need to create a HubSpot app? Or how to make the integration correctly?

Hi ilia, we may be able to help with this. You need to build an integration, but we have a managed version which would let you do it out of the box. Would you like to book a quick call and I can explain more? <https://meetings.HubSpot.com/matt-collis|https://meetings.HubSpot.com/matt-collis>
Sorry, can we be a little bit later?

Dear all,
is there any possibility to buy (even outside the official Marketplace) the Maka Power Theme Pro and use it with CMS Starter? e.g. use the source code as ‘own template’ and not use the corresponding Pro features (CTA tool, for instance)?

Hi <@U038J8BRR24>, happy to help you here!

We have a marketplace-independent product, for exactly that purpose, see here: <https://www.maka-agency.com/power-pro-for-cms-hub-starter>

Here is also an overview of our other products: <https://www.maka-agency.com/marketplace>
Thank you a bunch. You help us a lot  :heart:

Perfect! Thanks a lot!
As far as I understand it you take care of the complete setup and there is no CMS developer necessary?
How long does it usually take after the purchase or payment of invoice until the client can use it?
Perfect! I told the client, they will order in the next days.
